column1: of both sides of the case. Nothing is more likely to conduce to good
administration. [The emphasis added in this judgment]
The decision reached by the TAC that interest paid is capital expenditure and
cannot be allowed under section 26(1)(h) is therefore a nullity ab initio usque
ad finem, i.e., from the beginning to the end.
